articles.content: Following news that Escape from Tarkov is escaping its perpetual beta, the pioneering extraction shooter is also about to make its debut on Steam. Nikita Buyanov, head of the Battlestate Games studio that developed Escape from Tarkov , confirmed on X that the game's Steam page "will be available soon," only teasing that the full details will come later. articles.author: Jackson Chen

articles.title: The fight against labeling long-term streaming rentals as ‚Äúpurchases‚Äù you ‚Äúbuy‚Äù
articles.description: New law emboldens complaints against digital content rentals labled as purchases.
articles.content: Words have meaning. Proper word selection is integral to strong communication, whether it's about relaying one‚Äôs feelings to another or explaining the terms of a deal, agreement, or transaction. Language can be confusing, but typically when something is available to "buy," ownership of that good or access to that service is offered in exchange for money. That‚Äôs not really the case, though, when it comes to digital content. Often, streaming services like Amazon Prime Video offer customers the opt
articles.author: Scharon Harding

articles.title: Meta is struggling to rein in its AI chatbots
articles.description: Meta is changing some of the rules governing its chatbots two weeks after a Reuters investigation revealed disturbing ways in which they could, potentially, interact with minors. Now the company has told TechCrunch that its chatbots are being trained not to engage in conversations with minors around
articles.content: Meta is changing some of the rules governing its chatbots two weeks after a Reuters investigation revealed disturbing ways in which they could, potentially, interact with minors . Now the company has told TechCrunch that its chatbots are being trained not to engage in conversations with minors around self-harm, suicide, or disordered eating, and to avoid inappropriate romantic banter. These changes are interim measures, however, put in place while the company works on new permanent guidelines. T

articles.title: Earth models can predict the planet‚Äôs future but not their own
articles.description: One of the world‚Äôs foremost climate models now faces funding threats.
articles.content: I n the 1960s, meteorologist Edward Lorenz was running weather simulations on an early computer system when he realized that a small rounding difference led to extremely divergent weather predictions. He later called this idea the butterfly effect to communicate that small changes in initial conditions, like a butterfly flapping its wings in Nepal, could produce wildly different outcomes, like rain in New York. But better understanding those initial conditions and how the biological world couple
articles.author: Sarah Scoles, Undark Magazine

articles.content: Verizon has confirmed to customers in stores and online that its network is having an issue on Saturday. Some customers report their service has continued to function throughout the day, so it‚Äôs unclear what the cause is exactly.
